items.sentence: I never expected to meet Tom in a place like that.
I never meant to say anything about what happened.
I never wanted to do anything Tom suggested we do.
It\'s been three years since I\'ve been to Boston.
It\'s been a long time since I\'ve seen you smile.
Tom reluctantly gave Mary the money she asked for.
Tom rolled up his sleeve, exposing a hideous scar.
Tom just wants Mary to help him with his homework.
Tom killed the engine, but left the headlights on.
Tom knew better than to ask Mary what she thought.
